Articles.Content: I've been experimenting with making small drop planes, the kind that can be dropped from orbit, then enter the atmosphere and utilize jet engines. I would like to get a small air intake, something that its entire length is no longer than the Mk 1 fuel tank, has a low profile, and appears streamlined...
You can use intake precooler or engine nacelle because theyre both intakes and fuel tanks and are no bigger than mk1 tanks. I dont thing a dropplane would use more than 40 units of LF anyway.
